eu_initiatives: Harmonisation of the EU fertilizer regulation especially with regards to organic fertilizers and fertilising raw materials
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Fertilisers Working Group#E01320#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=1320#Observer#C#Subgroup of the Commission expert group on Recovery Rules for Fertilising Products
goals__remit:
1) Contact point for the regulatory and supervisory authorities in the European Union (harmonisation EU legislation of organic fertilisers, regulation animal by-products, …) 
 
2) Defending the quality of organic fertilisers in the European Union, in order to safeguard the interests of both consumers and crops.  
 
 3) Promotion of organic fertilisers for the advancement of sustainable agri- & horticulture and a healthy environment.
